commit_message:
Fixed Array.prototype.slice() with slow "this" argument.

Previously, when "this" argument was not a fast array, but the "deleted" array
was a fast array, the "deleted" array may be left in uninitialized state if
"this" argument had gaps.

This fix is to ensure that "deleted" is properly initialized.

This fixes #485 issue on Github.
cve_desc: Nginx NJS v0.7.2 was discovered to contain a segmentation violation in the function njs_value_own_enumerate at src/njs_value.c.

commit_message:
Merge pull request from GHSA-5x45-qp78-g4p4

* Prevent infinite loop in scanning xml content

* Simplify scanning method

* Optimization
cve_desc: PJSIP is a free and open source multimedia communication library written in the C language. Versions 2.12 and prior contain a denial-of-service vulnerability that affects PJSIP users that consume PJSIP's XML parsing in their apps. Users are advised to update. There are no known workarounds.
